import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function ViewListBlog({blog, showModal, setShowModal, deletePost}) { return (
className="m-2 flex justify-around items-center border-solid border-2 border-sky-500 rounded-md ">
Title: {blog.title}

Description: {blog.description}

Edit {/* Delete Modal */} {showModal ? ( <>
{/*content*/}
{/*header*/}

Want to delete?

{/*footer*/}
) : null}
) } export default ViewListBlog
